sn22.66:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.66:4.4: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu … pe …
sn22.66:5.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.66:5.9: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.66:6.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
sn22.66:6.10: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti … pe …
sn22.66:6.11: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosīti.
